response.overview: An epic portrayal of the events surrounding the infamous 1819 Peterloo Massacre, where a peaceful pro-democracy rally at St Peter’s Field in Manchester turned into one of the bloodiest and most notorious episodes in British history. The massacre saw British government forces charge into a crowd of over 60,000 that had gathered to demand political reforms and protest against rising levels of poverty.
response.title: Peterloo

titles.title: ピータールー マンチェスターの悲劇
ピータールー　マンチェスターの悲劇

cast.name: Christopher McMullen
